fu.polyarea

Class PointArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.polyarea.PointArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PointArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing a point area. It can be used to compute a buffer of a point (i.e. a circular poly area).
    Author:
    Jörg Roth
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PointArea(GPSPosition point, double radius)
      Creates a new instance of PointArea from the given GPSPosition and radius (meter).
